features: IMAGINE A NUTRITIONALLY COMPLETE, PLANT BASED TODDLER FORMULA THAT IS: Dairy Free, Lactose Free, Gluten Free, and made with Organic Oat Milk Powder, Organic Coconut Oil Powder, Organic Pea Protein and Organic Chickpea Protein!

OVER 20 VITAMINS AND NUTRIENTS FOR HEALTHY GROWTH AND DEVELOPMENT. Made with Prebiotics, and Bifidobacteria Probiotics naturally found in breast milk, giving you the highest quality, superior vegetarian toddler drink formula on the market!

INCLUDES Vegan DHA AND ARA AND ABSOLUTELY NO: Maltodextrin, Corn Syrup Solids, Fillers, Palm Oils, Rice Syrup, Soy Protein, Dairy, Lactose, Gluten or Genetically Modified Organisms (GMOs). Why would you choose anything else for the good start your child needs?

GREAT TASTING FOR THOSE PICKY EATERS, ensuring a pleasant and fresh feeding experience for children and parents! Discover why Growth Spurt is becoming every parent's choice for the Best Quality Powdered Formula on the Market! Gentle, Comfort, Worry Free!
INCLUDING A SUPERIOR BIOAVAILABLE METHYLFOLATE instead of Folic Acid, a superb Folate option, as well as Methylated B Vitamins for MTHFR!

MANUFACTURED IN THE USA; manufactured in a State-Of-The-Art Facility for guaranteed purity and quality in every drink! Your Growth Spurt Formula is backed by a lifetime money-back guarantee. Period. No questions asked. Click the Orange Button to order now!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Plant Based Milk: SUPERIOR PLANT BASED FORMULA TO SUPPORT YOUR GROWING TODDLER! If so, our Growth Spurt Premium Plant Based Formula is the ideal choice for you and your toddler! Our Plant Based Formula is specifically formulated to deliver optimal levels of essential vitamins and minerals that are modeled after breast milk, giving your weaning or supplementing child what he or she needs for strong and thriving development, and to guard against deficiencies throughout childhood. Our Plant Based Formula is a premium toddler formula with a number of key benefits: A nutritionally complete mix of the highest quality plant proteins including Organic Oatmilk, Organic Pea Protein, and Organic Chickpea Protein.Wide spectrum vitamin and mineral formula helps protect against deficiencies for reinforced body and brain development including a superior bioavailable Methylfolate instead of Folic Acid, and Methyl B Vitamins making it a superb option for MTHFR.Can help alleviate dairy and soy allergies and digestion issues with Vegan DHA & ARA, Prebiotics, Bifidobacteria Probiotics and more than 20 important nutrients for growth and development.Has none of the “junk” with absolutely NO: Maltodextrin, Palm Oils, Rice Syrup, Fillers, or Genetically Modified Organisms (GMOs).Every batch is 3rd party tested for heavy metals. If you would like a premium toddler formula, specifically formulated to promote optimal growth and guard against deficiencies in your thriving toddler, our Growth Spurt Premium Plant Based Toddler Formula is the perfect choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Baby loved it
reviews.reviewText: My son has a hard time with milk do I usually give him almond. I feel like he needed vitamins or done thing that provide what he needs. This product had more stuff and the plus is that it has prebiotic!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nutrient-Packed Formula for Toddlers!
reviews.reviewText: Growth Sprout is an excellent plant-based formula for toddlers! Packed with organic ingredients, it not only supports growth and development but also pleasantly surprised us with its delicious taste – our son enjoyed it. The formula is gentle on little tummies. It's a five-star choice for parents seeking a nutritious and tasty formula for their toddlers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Toddler Formula
reviews.reviewText: We love this formula! If you are looking for a great plant based toddler formula that is dairy and gluten free you have to try out Growth Spurt! I’m so glad my wife and I found an amazing formula that has all the vitamins and nutrients for our baby!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My toddler won’t touch this, he cringed and threw the cup. It smells and tastes so bad like chemicals or something rancid. I can’t even mix it into a smoothie because the flavor is so strong and so bad. What a waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s hard finding a good plant based formula, this one’s great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excited to find this!
reviews.reviewText: Was very excited to find a plant based formula that ranges up to the toddler stage! It is packed with lots of vitamins and nutrients for my daughter. So easy to add to her smoothies in the morning!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great alternative for baby formula!
reviews.reviewText: So great to try a product that’s plant based!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I loveee this cute formula! It came in super quick and it’s so affordable!
